ThingDef.label: daedalus components
ThingDef.description: A collection of gears and complicated mechanical components which are used to craft multiple equipments, and build wonderful low-tech contraptions.

ThingDef.label: ballista bolts
ThingDef.description: A simple, yet very deadly, ammunition used in mannable ballista turrets.

ThingDef.label: gatling ammo box
ThingDef.description: A metal box full of readily-made ammunition used in mannable gatling turrets.\n\nCaution! Very explosive!

RecipeDef.label: craft gatling turret ammunition
RecipeDef.description: Craft 50 rounds of ammunition for the mannable gatling turret.

ThingDef.label: high-explosive cannon shell
ThingDef.description: An explosive shell used by the mannable cannon turret.

ThingDef.label: anti-armor cannon shell
ThingDef.description: A specially-grade cannon shell made by the hunters workshop. Although it deals less damage, it can inflict enemies under a 10.9 explosion radius with armor bane.

ThingDef.label: visceral solution
ThingDef.description: A syrup-like substance made from brain matter. Exclusively manufactured from the hunter's workshop as a main ingredient for their combat potions.

ThingDef.label: scroll of shadows "Dark Spear"
ThingDef.description: An advanced archotech device that can teach any pawn with a dark constitution gene the dark spear ability.

HediffDef.label: Extra skill : Dark Spear
HediffDef.description: A unique condition after using a scroll of shadows, allowing the user to learn the dark spear skill, and slightly decrease their ranged weapon cooldown and aiming delay.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: After using a scroll of shadows, they can learn the skill "Dark Spear", along with receiving increased stats. This can be installed up to 3 times.
